QuestData.Title: Shaken and Stirred
QuestData.Description: I have sent my brothers to assault the Verlok village from below. The Verlok will gather on their rocky ledges, as they always do to avoid our ire. When they do, we shall make the earth itself shake them until they fall at our feet below.$B$BThat is where you prove your use. When they fall to the ground amongst my brothers, make sure that they do not rise again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Verlok Pillartumblers in the lower section of Verlok Stand.
QuestData.CompletionText: Strangely, your size and resourcefulness are starting to prove quite useful.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done fleshling. Your presence complemented my brothers well.
